# orion-tooltip

Tooltip is a component that displays a tooltip message. It is used to display additional information about an element.

Additional documentation available at [orion.united.com](https://orion.united.com/)

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property          | Attribute          | Description | Type                | Default    |
| ----------------- | ------------------ | ----------- | ------------------- | ---------- |
| `tooltipPosition` | `tooltip-position` |             | `"bottom" \| "top"` | `'bottom'` |
| `tooltipWidth`    | `tooltip-width`    |             | `number`            | `200`      |


## Slots

| Slot                   | Description                          |
| ---------------------- | ------------------------------------ |
| `"default"`            | default slot for the tooltip trigger |
| `"orion-tooltip-body"` | slot for body content                |
